LanguageData.VFEI_RoyalJellyHigh.label: high on royal jelly
LanguageData.VFEI_RoyalJellyTolerance.label: royal jelly tolerance
LanguageData.VFEI_RoyalJellyAddiction.label: royal jelly addiction
LanguageData.VFEI_RoyalJellyAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.description: Toxins in the bloodstream. This can come from various sources, including environmental toxins, venomous bites, or poisoned weapons. \nAt high doses, toxic buildup is lethal. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers. \nContrary to base game toxic buildup, creatures who die with this toxic damage can be eaten.
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.label: toxic buildup
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.VFEI_ToxicBuildup.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.description: Plasmapiercer shock can knock down most humanlike and larger creatures.
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.label: plasmapiercer shock
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.VFEI_TempDown.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.VFEI_DroneGenome.label: drone genome
LanguageData.VFEI_InsectoidLeg.label: insectoid leg
LanguageData.VFEI_InsectoidLeg.description: A jointed appendage of an insectoid, consisting of several chitin covered segments. Whilst it’s an extremely painful mutation, this leg has much higher resistance to damage.
LanguageData.VFEI_InsectoidArm.label: insectoid arm
LanguageData.VFEI_InsectoidArm.description: A jointed appendage of an insectoid, consisting of several chitin covered segments. Whilst it’s an extremely painful mutation, this arm has much higher resistance to damage.
LanguageData.VFEI_CompoundEye.label: compound eye
LanguageData.VFEI_CompoundEye.description: An eye consisting of thousands of individual photoreceptor units, compound eyes have a large field of view and help with detecting fast movement, however its visibility range is significantly reduced. Whilst it’s an extremely painful mutation, this eye has a higher resistance to damage.
LanguageData.VFEI_Mandibles.label: mandibles
LanguageData.VFEI_Mandibles.description: A pair of appendages situated on the sides of the mouth, Helping to crush and cut the food. Whilst it’s significantly less comfortable than normal jaw, insectoid mandibles significantly increase eating speed.
LanguageData.VFEI_JellySac.label: jelly sac
LanguageData.VFEI_JellySac.description: A tube-like organ grown within the body. It allows humans to produce low quantities of insect jelly over time. It’s an extremely painful mutation, in some cases requiring medical enhancement for the person to actually live with it.
LanguageData.VFEI_WarriorGenome.label: warrior genome
LanguageData.VFEI_VenomGland.label: venom gland
LanguageData.VFEI_VenomGland.description: A sack-like gland tucked under the tongue that secretes acid, liquifying and allowing to safely consume even the most dangerous foods. The overstimulation of this gland enables the user to throw a short range acid spitting attack, effective at going through armor.
LanguageData.VFEI_VenomGland.comps.0.tools.0.label: venom gland
LanguageData.VFEI_PneumaticClaw.label: pneumatic claw
LanguageData.VFEI_PneumaticClaw.description: A powerful pneumatic pincer arm, capable of repeatedly exerting great pressure on the target at the cost of refined motor skills.
LanguageData.VFEI_PneumaticClaw.comps.0.tools.0.label: claw
LanguageData.VFEI_Antenna.label: antenna
LanguageData.VFEI_Antenna.description: A slender, mobile sensory organ that serves to compliment vision and locational awareness. A subject with this mutation will no longer suffer from darkness penalties, however sensory overload makes it very difficult to socialize.
LanguageData.VFEI_PredatorStomach.label: predator stomach
LanguageData.VFEI_PredatorStomach.description: A highly efficient, although basic stomach alternative. Subjects with this mutation will be able to live longer with less food.
LanguageData.VFEI_RoyalGenome.label: royal genome
LanguageData.VFEI_PheromoneSecretor.label: pheromone secretor
LanguageData.VFEI_PheromoneSecretor.description: Insectoid glands that slowly leak colorless, odorless, but sticky pheromone, notable for inducing a mild euphoria in those nearby.
LanguageData.VFEI_VentricularSleeve.label: ventricular sleeve
LanguageData.VFEI_VentricularSleeve.description: A barely understood heart and artery mutation, causes blood to coagulate into oxygen-rich gel-like material. Upon laceration or even loss of limbs, the gel will cauterize the wound immediately. Unfortunately puts heavy strain on human cardiovascular biology.
LanguageData.VFEI_SynapticCerebellum.label: synaptic cerebellum
LanguageData.VFEI_SynapticCerebellum.description: An insectoid brain particularly sensitive to residual psychic synapse. A creature with this mutation possesses profound collective thought and psychic sensitivity, however is barely able to form cohesive sentences.
